system.description: You create a cloud of gas in an Area equal to the size of the delivery (minimum 5-foot cube). Targets act as Sickened (Vulnerable) while in the Area.
system.effect: You create a cloud of gas in an Area equal to the size of the delivery (minimum 5-foot cube). Targets act as Sickened (Vulnerable) while in the Area.
system.critEffect: The effect lasts 1 Hour, but can be dispersed by strong winds.
